name: Jet Dudes
description:
Jet Dudes is a very enjoyable side-scrolling jet flying game!

Choose one of three dudes and try to fly as far as you can.
Avoid enemies or shoot them down.
Get bonuses and extra score items.

- awesome graphics
- easy controls
- bonuses
- different enemies
- Game Center support
- leaderboards and achievements
- Retina Display support
- Universal
